The genie nodded, raised a hand, pointed to Yui, and a beam shoot from her index finger, and it hit Yui, causing a flash.

The flash died down, "Wish granted," the genie announced. Yui was still stood where she a moment ago, but now she was just wearing lacy black underwear, Leo looked down an saw a simple pair of shorts, it was a little cold in the room, but neither Leo nor Yui took notice.

Leo looked at Yui, "Why did you wish that?" he asked confused. "Because I hate cold, and I didn't want to be bothered by it any more, and I didn't like clothing, that much, I don't mind this because it is so light."

Leo looked at the genie, "What now?" he asked himself.
15522.title: Yui made a wish

155221.content:
"My turn to make a wish," Leo said.

"What is your wish, master?" the genie asked.


wish 1: "I wish we could touch any girl we wanted without getting in trouble whenever we want, including a police officer in the middle of a public place or a married woman in front of her husband."
wish 2: "I wish me and Yui were the king and queen of the world, and everyone does whatever we say without question, never even considering turning on us."
155221.title: Another wish

choices: Leo and Yui says, you do
1553.content: maybe Leo and Yui wake up one day where everyone else must do what they say when they start a sentence with "Leo says..." or "Yui says..."? for example, if Leo were to say to Mimi "Leo says to flash her tits at everyone she sees", she'll do it without complaint. or maybe they find a magic cat, and after discovering they're immune to it's mind control eyes, it helps give them a harem in exchange for a loving home

4) Madeline Roar- Leo's older sister, 21YO, short black hair, brown eyes, D cup, loves to pick on Leo
5) Mimi Roar- Leo's younger sister, 18YO, short brown hair, blue eyes, C cup, loves to pull pranks on Leo
6) Leona Roar- Leo's twin sister, 19YO, blond hair halfway to her ass, green eyes, E-cup, heart-shaped ass, sees Leo as more than a brother and has a crush on him and Yui. she was born a few minutes after Leo. she also has a bit of a tickle fetish, and is ticklish all over, even her ass.
7) Linda Howl- aunt, 35YO, short brown hair, green eyes, DD cup, kind to Leo
8) Kayla Howl- cousin, 17YO, short brown hair, blue eyes, CC cup, loves to tease Leo
9) Junko Sakura- Yui's mother. 42 years old but doesn't look a day over 35, never mind one who's had five kids. Wears her pink hair short, has enchanting blue eyes, as do her kids, and likes to put her D-cup boobs on display.
Minako, Sachiko, and Tomoko Sakura- Yui's older sisters and triplets, 19 years old, they just finished their freshman year at the local university. According to Yui, they put a lot of work into looking identical--though they haven't gone quite so far as to get their fingerprints surgically altered to match. They like to wear their pink hair down to the middle of their backs and, like their mother, like to put their C-cup boobs on display, and are a bit jealous of Yui's larger breasts.
10) Masami Sakura- Yui's younger sister, 15 years old, she still looks much younger as she hasn't entered puberty yet. Wears her pink hair in long braids.
11) Dawn Jones- Yui's aunt. Shortly after Junko's birth, her father passed away and soon after her mother married a man from the US. He insisted that his daughter, two years younger than his stepdaughter, would have a "good American name". She got an odd mix of racial features--her mother's Asian heritage shows in her face and the rest of her colouration, but it's framed by shoulder-length golden blonde hair and contains vibrant green eyes, which she passed to her kids. She tends to dress modestly, but can't hide her F-cup tits and large butt.
12) Sandra and Veronica Jones- Dawn's daughters. Dawn also married a man from the US, shortly after he got her pregnant when she was 18. He was content to let her keep her last name and pass it to her daughters, but insisted that he would give them their first names. Fraternal twins, Sandra has her mother's hair and could pass for Caucasian except for her clearly Asian eyes, while Veronica is the opposite, with pink hair and Asian colouration contrasting with her almond-shaped eyes. Veronica prefers to wear her hair like her aunt's, while Sandra keeps her blonde hair as long as Yui's. They did both inherit their mother's curves, but unlike her love showing them off. They just earned bachelor's degrees from the same university that their triplet cousins attend.
13) Melissa Jones- six years older than Dawn, and her half-sister from her father's first marriage. Small with unremarkable Caucasian features, brown eyes and lanky brown hair. She never married and has no children. She has no curves at all, is very submissive and dreams of being a busty, curvy toy for a man to use.
14) Jessica Jugg- landlord, 38YO, , brown eyes, shoulder length black hair, single, harsh towards Leo, but kind to his family
15) Jenny Jugg- Jessica's daughter and Jasmine's twin sister, green eyes, short blond hair, E cup, loves to pick on Leo
16) Jasmine Jugg- Jessica's daughter and Jenny's twin sister, blue eyes, short blond hair, E cup, loves to pick on Leo
17) Chloe Kare- security guard, 35YO, brown eyes, dark brown hair to the middle of her back, FF boobs, big butt, slightly chunky, stern
18) Kaitlyn Kare- Chloe's daughter, 19YO, brown eyes, shoulder length brown hair, E boobs, nice ass, slim, doesn't like Leo, Yui, or their families
